address.description: Wallet address that will receive Advertiser fees

multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the total reward amount to calculate fees

amount.description: A flat amount added to the total reward amount to calculate fees

recurring.description: In the circumstance where Campaign rewards are unpriced, a recurring fee may apply

minimum.description: A minimum fee applied when rewards are claimed

sig.description: Affiliate DID signature to verify the reward claim

completed_at.description: Timestamp at which the reward was marked as completed

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the reward was created

conversions.description: Array of conversion identifiers that make up this reward claim

fee.description: Fee amount calculated by the network and associated to this reward claim
